script.source: def results = [:];for (int retrieverNum = 0; retrieverNum < inputs.size(); ++retrieverNum) {    def retrieverResult = inputs[retrieverNum];    int rank = retrieverResult.size();    for (ScriptRankDoc scriptRankDoc : retrieverResult) {        ScoreDoc scoreDoc = scriptRankDoc.scoreDoc();        results.compute(new RankKey(scoreDoc.doc, scoreDoc.shardIndex), (key, value) -> {            def v = value;            if (v == null) {                v = new ScoreDoc(scoreDoc.doc, 0f, scoreDoc.shardIndex);            }            v.score += params.weights[retrieverNum] * (1.0 / (params.k + rank));            return v;        });        --rank;    }}def output = new ArrayList(results.values());output.sort((ScoreDoc sd1, ScoreDoc sd2) -> { return sd1.score < sd2.score ? 1 : -1; });return output;
